title: I lost my character sheet
body: So usualy you have the block next to the splash face of your champ and you press c then it expands to the rest of your stats but now i dont i have the smaller square that shows ap ,ad,armor,and mr. I can only see them if i press c

replies.body: The option to show basic stats is a toggle feature.  Clicking on the little plate helmet icon should toggle that back on.  You will still have to tap C for advanced details, though.  Hope that helps!
